title: I forgot my PW and can't access the email I signed up with.
body: I am level 30 and have many skins invested in this account. It has been over a year since I played and the email I signed up with was hacked so I can't access my PW reset.  Is there another way to prove it is me?

replies.body: There absolutely is! Hurry and send out account recovery agents a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to work with you to verify that you created the account. After that, they can help you get access to that account again.
